All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActivityCodes
Enum representing various activity request codes used in the application.
DeleteItemFragment
DeleteItemFragment is a DialogFragment subclass used for confirming item deletion in the application.
DeleteItemFragment.DeleteDialogListener
Interface for communicating the dialog actions to the parent context.
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
FirestoreDB
FirestoreDB is a utility class that provides access to Firebase Firestore database instances and references.
Inventory
Represents an inventory containing a collection of items.
InventoryAdapter
Implements adapter functionality in order to link the InventoryViewActivity's ListView element to the array of Items in an Inventory.
InventoryViewActivity
Displays the content of a given Inventory (ie.
Item
Represents an item with various attributes such as purchase date, description, make, model, serial number, estimated value, comments, and tags.
ItemTest
 
ItemViewActivity
ItemViewActivity is an AppCompatActivity that displays detailed information about a selected item.
LedgerAdapter
Implements adapter functionality in order to link the LedgerFragment's ListView element to the array of Inventories in a Ledger.
LedgerFragment
Displays the Ledger: a list of all the signed-in user's Inventories.
LedgerViewActivity
LedgerViewActivity is an AppCompatActivity that manages the main user interface for the application.
ProfileFragment
ProfileFragment is a subclass of Fragment that represents the user profile section in the application.
ProfileViewModel
ProfileViewModel is a ViewModel associated with the ProfileFragment.
UpsertViewActivity
This class is responsible for updating/inserting items in an inventory
